# Dataset general metadata element schema

**Description:** Dataset general metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

## Dataset Name

**Label:** datasetName

**Description:** Name of the dataset.

**Required:** Yes

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "datasetName field schema",
  "description": "datasetName field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": true,
    "minLength": 5
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "@value": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "@value"
  ],
  "schema:name": "datasetName",
  "schema:description": "Name of the dataset.",
  "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "skos:prefLabel": "Dataset Name",
  "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/a74292a5-b830-4ea1-89eb-42c809f69456",
  "skos:altLabel": [
    "BIDS:Name (metadata)",
    "openMINDS:fullName"
  ],
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
```
</details>

## Dataset Type

**Label:** datasetType

**Description:** The type(s) of data present in the dataset.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/terms/type) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "type": "array",
  "minItems": 1,
  "items": {
    "type": "object",
    "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
    "@context": {
      "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
      "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
      "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
      "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
      "schema:name": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "schema:description": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:prefLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:altLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "pav:createdOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "pav:createdBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      },
      "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "oslc:modifiedBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      }
    },
    "title": "datasetType field schema",
    "description": "datasetType field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
    "_ui": {
      "inputType": "checkbox"
    },
    "_valueConstraints": {
      "requiredValue": true,
      "multipleChoice": true,
      "literals": [
        {
          "label": "Raw Data"
        },
        {
          "label": "Derived Data"
        },
        {
          "label": "Source Data"
        }
      ]
    },
    "properties": {
      "@type": {
        "oneOf": [
          {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          {
            "type": "array",
            "minItems": 1,
            "items": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uri"
            },
            "uniqueItems": true
          }
        ]
      },
      "@value": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      },
      "rdfs:label": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      }
    },
    "required": [
      "@value"
    ],
    "additionalProperties": false,
    "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
    "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
    "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
    "schema:name": "datasetType",
    "schema:description": "The type(s) of data present in the dataset.",
    "skos:prefLabel": "Dataset Type",
    "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/a738f325-591e-4f1e-9e97-15e2f6d7749d",
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
  }
}
```
</details>

## Dataset License (Open-source)

**Label:** datasetLicense

**Description:** The open-source license associated with the use of the dataset being described.

**Required:** Yes

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/terms/license) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "datasetLicense field schema",
  "description": "datasetLicense field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": true,
    "ontologies": [],
    "valueSets": [],
    "classes": [],
    "branches": [
      {
        "source": "Biomedical Informatics Research Network Project Lexicon (BIRNLEX)",
        "acronym": "BIRNLEX",
        "uri": "http://bioontology.org/projects/ontologies/birnlex#birnlex_2343",
        "name": "Open-source license",
        "maxDepth": 0
      }
    ],
    "multipleChoice": false
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "@id": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "uri"
    }
  },
  "schema:name": "datasetLicense",
  "schema:description": "The open-source license associated with the use of the dataset being described.",
  "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "skos:prefLabel": "Dataset License (Open-source)",
  "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/8162593d-8fc1-44a8-9605-054c3e49ba22",
  "skos:altLabel": [
    "BIDS:License (metadata)"
  ],
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
```
</details>

## Dataset Authors

**Label:** datasetAuthors

**Description:** The list of individuals who contributed to the creation/curation of the dataset.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/creator) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "type": "array",
  "minItems": 1,
  "items": {
    "type": "object",
    "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
    "@context": {
      "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
      "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
      "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
      "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
      "schema:name": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "schema:description": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:prefLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:altLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "pav:createdOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "pav:createdBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      },
      "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "oslc:modifiedBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      }
    },
    "title": "datasetAuthors field schema",
    "description": "datasetAuthors field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
    "_ui": {
      "inputType": "textfield"
    },
    "_valueConstraints": {
      "requiredValue": true
    },
    "properties": {
      "@type": {
        "oneOf": [
          {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          {
            "type": "array",
            "minItems": 1,
            "items": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uri"
            },
            "uniqueItems": true
          }
        ]
      },
      "@value": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      },
      "rdfs:label": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      }
    },
    "required": [
      "@value"
    ],
    "additionalProperties": false,
    "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
    "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
    "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
    "schema:name": "datasetAuthors",
    "schema:description": "The list of individuals who contributed to the creation/curation of the dataset.",
    "skos:prefLabel": "Dataset Authors",
    "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/18df5b0b-2999-4093-bbb6-2eddf1ff52ad",
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
  }
}
```
</details>

## Acknowledgements

**Label:** acknowledgements

**Description:** Text acknowledging contributions of individuals or institutions beyond those listed in authors or funding.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/7abef02f-9e6e-4f99-bd43-d532323c6159) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "acknowledgements field schema",
  "description": "acknowledgements field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": false
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "@value": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "@value"
  ],
  "schema:name": "acknowledgements",
  "schema:description": "Text acknowledging contributions of individuals or institutions beyond those listed in authors or funding.",
  "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "skos:prefLabel": "Acknowledgements",
  "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/d80af52b-2ae5-4134-a243-f23a5521636d",
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
```
</details>

## Example Usage

**Label:** howToAcknowledge

**Description:** Text containing instructions on how researchers using this dataset should acknowledge the original authors. This field can also be used to define a publication that should be cited in publications that use the dataset.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.org/usageInfo) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "howToAcknowledge field schema",
  "description": "howToAcknowledge field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": false
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "@value": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "@value"
  ],
  "schema:name": "howToAcknowledge",
  "schema:description": "Text containing instructions on how researchers using this dataset should acknowledge the original authors. This field can also be used to define a publication that should be cited in publications that use the dataset.",
  "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "skos:prefLabel": "Example Usage",
  "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/ccdebb42-1a53-42a8-88a0-4a4bd8d6b580",
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
```
</details>

## Funding

**Label:** funding

**Description:** List of sources of funding. Please use grant numbers wherever possible.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#hasFundingVehicle) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "funding field schema",
  "description": "funding field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": false
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "@value": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "@value"
  ],
  "schema:name": "funding",
  "schema:description": "List of sources of funding. Please use grant numbers wherever possible.",
  "pav:createdOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-03-25T09:07:24-07:00",
  "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
  "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "skos:prefLabel": "Funding",
  "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/f6008ded-6c01-4a2e-8af0-51447ea63526",
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
```
</details>

## Ethics Approval

**Label:** ethicsApproval

**Description:** Specifies documented ethics approval for animal experiments, ensuring compliance with ethical and welfare standards. Required to demonstrate adherence to ethical guidelines and humane treatment of animals.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/DUO_0000021) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",

    }
```

## References

**Label:** referencesAndLinks

**Description:** List of references to publications that contain information on the dataset. A reference may be textual or a URI.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/dc/terms/references) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json

  "minItems": 1,
  "items": {

      "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",

        "@type": "xsd:string"
```

## Dataset DOI

**Label:** datasetDOI

**Description:** Indicate the dataset's unique Digital Object Identifier (DOI), ensuring it refers to the dataset itself rather than any associated publications. Format DOIs as valid URIs, starting with 'doi:' followed by the identifier.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://purl.org/spar/datacite/hasIdentifier) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",

    },

    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"

    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"

    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"

    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
```
